select Z.* from ( SELECT '식당' ORDP, a.ORD_DATE, count(a.ORD_DATE)-count(a.CONF_DATE) CORDDATE, count(a.CONF_DATE) CCONFDATE, count(a.CANC_DATE) CCANCDATE, a.CONTRACT_ID, REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ORD_DATE, '[^[:alnum:]]+', '') ORDDATE2 from GHT_REST_ORDERSHEET a left join ghtech.GHT_GOODS_COMBO b on a.GOODS_CODE = b.GOODS_ID where a.CONTRACT_ID= #{CONTRACT_ID} and a.MOD_DATE is NULL group by a.ORD_DATE UNION ALL SELECT '매점' ORDP, a.ORD_DATE, count(a.ORD_DATE)-count(a.CONF_DATE) CORDDATE, count(a.CONF_DATE) CCONFDATE, count(a.CANC_DATE) CCANCDATE, a.CONTRACT_ID , REGEXP_REPLACE(a.ORD_DATE, '[^[:alnum:]]+', '') ORDDATE2 from GHT_STORE_ORDSHEET a left join ghtech.GHT_GOODS_COMBO b on a.GOODS_CODE = b.GOODS_ID where a.CONTRACT_ID= #{CONTRACT_ID} and a.MOD_DATE is NULL group by a.ORD_DATE ) Z order by ORD_DATE DESC
